title: Where are the arcade tickets?
body:
Where are the arcade tickets?  seriously just tell me exactly where to click   (I don't see them under loot)
Also you guys got to make these events less confusing just **** say where to click in the future it doesn't cost you anything

replies.body: We can work on that in the future, but if you look in your Hextech Loot under Materials you should see those tickets that you're looking for! If they are not showing up for you make sure you reach back out to me :)
